itemDescription: British politician, Cabinet Minister and life peer. (1926-2008)

wikipedia_page.main: Peter Wynford Innes Rees, Baron Rees,  (9 December 1926 – 30 November 2008) was a British Conservative politician and barrister. He was Member of Parliament (MP) for Dover and Deal from 1974 to 1983 and MP for Dover from 1970 to 1974 and 1983 to 1987.  He was Chief Secretary to the Treasury from 1983 until 1985. He was created a life peer as Baron Rees, of Goytre, in 1987.
